Imports

spec

Types

VersionField = typeof(Version.major)
VersionIndex = range[0 .. 2]
VersionMaskField = Option[VersionField]
VersionMask = object
  major*: VersionMaskField
  minor*: VersionMaskField
  patch*: VersionMaskField

Operator = enum
  Tag = "#", Wild = "*", Tilde = "~", Caret = "^", Equal = "==", AtLeast = ">=", Over = ">",
  Under = "<", NotMore = "<="
Release = object
  case kind*: Operator
  of Tag:
      reference*: string

  of Wild, Caret, Tilde:
      accepts*: VersionMask

  of Equal, AtLeast, Over, Under, NotMore:
      version*: Version

  
Requirement = object
  identity*: string
  operator*: Operator
  release*: Release

Requires = OrderedTableRef[Requirement, Requirement]
